fabricante = servidor
  • {{fabricantes[indice]}} = {{menu}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-main-servidores', templateUrl: './main-servidores.component.html', styleUrls: ['./main-servidores.component.scss'] }) export class MainServidoresComponent { lista=["WAS","WebLogic","tomcat","wildfly","DB2","IIS"]; fabricantes=["IBM","Oracle","XX","XX","XX","XX"] }
